item.title: 通胀数据公布后，美国信贷恐慌指数创八月以来新高
item.description: 经济报告显示通胀率居高不下，加剧了人们对关税将如何影响物价的担忧，同时消费支出也显示出疲软迹象，因此衡量信贷市场恐慌情绪的指标升至七个月来的新高。【原文：A gauge of credit market fear rose to a fresh seven-month high after economic reports suggested inflation is staying stubbornly high, adding to concerns about how tariffs will affect prices, while consumer spending is showing signs of weakness.】

item.title: CFTC 撤回有关数字资产清算风险审查的咨询意见
item.description: 美国商品期货交易委员会正在撤回一项关于审查与数字资产清算和交易相关的风险的建议。【原文：The US Commodity Futures Trading Commission is withdrawing an advisory on the review of risks tied to clearing and trading digital assets.】

item.title: Chuck E. 奶酪公司竭力为 6.6 亿美元债券寻找买家
item.description: 据熟悉该交易的人士透露，Chuck E. Cheese 的所有者 CEC Entertainment 正在努力为 6.6 亿美元的高收益债券销售吸引足够的需求，以便为明年到期的债务再融资。【原文：Chuck E. Cheese owner CEC Entertainment is struggling to drum up enough demand for a $660 million high-yield bond sale to refinance debt it has due next year, according to people familiar with the transaction.】

item.title: 贸易战阻力增大，加拿大人拒绝飞往美国
item.description: 随着两国贸易战的升级，飞往美国的加拿大人越来越少，度假习惯也随之改变。【原文：Fewer Canadians are flying to the US as an escalating trade war between the nations alters vacation habits.】

item.title: Ceva Santé Animale 即将完成价值 90 亿欧元的融资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，法国动物保健公司Ceva Santé Animale即将完成最新一轮融资，该轮融资将使公司估值达到或超过90亿欧元（97亿美元）。【原文：French animal health firm Ceva Santé Animale is close to completing its latest funding round that would value the company at €9 billion ($9.7 billion) or more, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国联邦存款保险公司（FDIC）简化银行承接部分加密货币业务的路径
item.description: 受美国联邦存款保险公司监管的银行从事加密货币相关活动不再需要事先获得批准，从而废除了拜登时代旨在最大限度降低银行和消费者风险的政策。【原文：Banks supervised by the US Federal Deposit Insurance Corp. no longer need prior approval to engage in crypto-related activities, undoing a Biden-era policy that sought to minimize risks to banks and consumers.】

item.title: 迈克-梅奥认为政策导致的瘫痪影响银行盈利
item.description: 华尔街资深人士迈克-梅奥（Mike Mayo）坚持看好今年美国银行的走势。只是近期美国贸易政策的摇摆不定将在短期内损害该集团的收益。【原文：Wall Street veteran Mike Mayo is sticking to his bullish call for US banks this year. It’s just the on-again, off-again swings of American trade policy of late are going to hurt the group’s earnings in the near term.】

item.title: 卢拉获胜，巴西创造的正式工作岗位超出预期
item.description: 巴西 2 月份创造的正式工作岗位多于预期，总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）赢得了胜利，同时也验证了拉丁美洲最大经济体正在迅速放缓的观点。【原文：Brazil created more formal jobs than expected in February, handing President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva a win while testing views that Latin America’s largest economy is quickly slowing down.】

item.title: 可转换再融资交易受阻，Wolfspeed 股票下挫
item.description: Wolfspeed 公司正努力与投资者达成协议，为明年到期的 5.75 亿美元可转换债券再融资。【原文：Wolfspeed Inc. is struggling to reach a deal with investors to refinance its $575 million convertible bonds due next year.】

item.title: CoreWeave 在大幅缩减 15 亿美元的首次公开募股规模后下跌 2.5%
item.description: 云计算供应商 CoreWeave Inc. 在缩小规模的首次公开募股中募集了 15 亿美元，该公司首次上市即下滑 2.5%。【原文：CoreWeave Inc. slipped 2.5% in its market debut after the cloud-computing provider raised $1.5 billion in a downsized initial public offering.】

item.title: 美国银行将 2025 年小额贷款销售额预测上调至 5800 亿美元
item.description: 市政债券市场最大的承销商预计，随着州政府和地方政府快速开发市场，今年的发行量将更大。【原文：The municipal bond market’s biggest underwriter is expecting even more issuance this year as state and local governments tap the market at a rapid clip.】

item.title: 比特币期权显示交易者正在对冲比特币回落至 80,000 美元以下的风险
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普计划在下周宣布的关税措施令金融市场惶惶不安，加密货币交易商纷纷涌向期权市场，以对冲价格进一步下跌的风险。【原文：Crypto traders are flocking to the options market to hedge against further price declines, as President Donald Trump’s planned tariff announcements next week keep financial market on edge.】

item.title: 贸易战来袭，经济学家下调加拿大经济增长预期
item.description: 经济学家在一项新的调查中预测，由于与美国的贸易战阻碍了商业投资和出口，加拿大将进入一个增长疲软、通胀上升的时期。【原文：Canada is headed for a period of weaker growth and higher inflation as a trade war with the US snarls business investment and exports, economists forecast in a new survey.】

item.title: 欧元区通胀率保持在 2% 以上，欧洲央行或将继续保持开放态度
item.description: 下周至关重要的欧元区通胀数据可能只会显示出有限的改善，为是否再次降息的辩论双方提供论据。【原文：Crucial euro-zone inflation data next week may reveal only limited improvement, offering arguments for both sides of the debate on whether to cut interest rates again.】

item.title: 英特尔董事会成员离职，芯片制造商寻求增加专业知识
item.description: 英特尔公司（Intel Corp. ）表示，该公司董事会的三名成员即将退休，因为该公司正集中精力培养芯片制造商扭亏为盈所需的专业人才。【原文：Intel Corp. said three members of its board of directors are retiring as it focuses on the kind of expertise needed for the chipmaker’s turnaround.】

item.title: 关税担忧为何让铜跟随黄金屡创新高？
item.description: 由于担心对进口红色金属征收关税，今年美国铜价一路走高。纽约商品期货交易所（Comex）的期货价格屡创新高，导致比伦敦的国际基准价格溢价；这与黄金市场上出现的脱节现象类似。【原文：US prices of copper have been on a tear this year due to the fear that tariffs will be imposed on imports of the red metal. Futures prices have hit record highs on New York’s Comex, leading to a premium over the international benchmark in London — similar to the disconnect seen in the gold market.】

item.title: 关税和通胀忧虑袭来，大科技股引发市场反弹
item.description: 周五，美国股市再次下挫，风险资产受到重重打击，从关税担忧再起，到有迹象表明通胀依然坚挺，而消费支出却摇摆不定。【原文：US stocks buckled again Friday as risk assets were pummeled by everything from renewed tariff concerns to signs that inflation remains sticky while consumer spending wobbles.】

item.title: 德国公共部门工人工资可能错峰增长
item.description: 在与雇主进行了三轮谈判未果的情况下，德国成立了一个仲裁委员会，如果他们接受该委员会提出的建议，德国公共部门的工人可能会分两个阶段获得加薪。【原文：German public-sector workers may get a pay rise in two stages if they accept a proposal from an arbitration commission that was installed when three rounds of talks with employers failed to produce a result.】

item.title: 加纳新任央行行长惊喜加息
item.description: 加纳新任央行行长约翰逊-阿西亚马（Johnson Asiama）在首次议息时提高了借贷成本，令金融市场大吃一惊。【原文：Ghana’s new central bank Governor Johnson Asiama surprised financial markets by raising borrowing costs at its first rate-setting.】

item.title: 美联储和联邦存款保险公司计划撤回《社区再投资法》最终规则
item.description: 由于诉讼未决，美联储和其他两个银行监管机构宣布计划从 2023 年起撤销《社区再投资法》规则。【原文：The Federal Reserve and two other banking regulators announced plans to withdraw the Community Reinvestment Act rule from 2023 due to pending litigation.】

item.title: 法国巴罗表示干邑在中国的调查推迟了三个月
item.description: 就在欧洲烈酒制造商面临美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税威胁之际，中国推迟了对干邑和雅马邑的反倾销调查。【原文：China has postponed the conclusion of its anti-dumping investigation of Cognac and Armagnac, providing a reprieve to European spirits makers just as they face tariff threats from US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 武契奇说美国对塞尔维亚炼油厂的制裁推迟了30天
item.description: 塞尔维亚总统亚历山大-武契奇周五表示，美国对塞尔维亚Naftna Industrija Srbije d.d.（一家由俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom PJSC）控制的炼油厂）的制裁被推迟了30天。【原文：US sanctions against Serbia’s Naftna Industrija Srbije d.d., a refiner controlled by Russia’s Gazprom PJSC, were postponed on Friday for 30 days, Serbian President Aleksandar Vucic said.】

item.title: 特朗普与卡尼在贸易争端中会谈，计划在大选后会晤
item.description: 在邻国盟友和主要贸易伙伴之间的关税战愈演愈烈之际，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他与加拿大总理马克-卡尼进行了通话，两人将在加拿大举行大选后会晤。【原文：President Donald Trump said he spoke with Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney and that the two would meet after Canada holds elections, amid an intensifying tariff war between the neighboring allies and major trading partners.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长纳格尔提醒不要对通胀过度乐观
item.description: 欧洲央行管理委员会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，即使有关通胀的新数据指向正确方向，欧洲央行官员也不应对实现通胀目标过于自信。【原文：European Central Bank officials shouldn’t become too confident on reaching their inflation goal even if new data on that front are pointing in the right direction, Governing Council member Joachim Nagel said.】
